definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Therefore, it made water body in the ci…
sentences.chinese: 合理利用地表水体的自净作用。
污染物质能使地表水酸化。

sentences.english: Excavate coal subsided water area is the special component of the surface water in Huainan.
sentences.chinese: 采煤塌陷水域已成为淮南市矿区一种特殊的地表水体。

sentences.english: The farmland irrigation of Datong city in the past was mainly depend on surface water irrigation.
sentences.chinese: 大同市以往的农田灌溉，多以地表水灌溉为主。

sentences.english: Study on Bioremediation of Oil-contaminated Surface Water by Using Immobilized Bacillus Sp.
sentences.chinese: 固定化芽孢杆菌修复油污染地表水的研究。

sentences.english: It is found in trace amounts in groundwater throughout the world.
sentences.chinese: 全世界地表水中都含有微量的氚。

sentences.english: Surface water resources in Liaohe river basin middle and downstream are poor.
sentences.chinese: 辽河流域中下游地区地表水资源贫乏。

definition: water source/water supply/headwaters of a river
